title: 第一个错误的版本 (First Bad Version)
content: 思路: // @Title: 第一个错误的版本 (First Bad Version) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2022-02-26 11:56:41 // @Runtime: 20 ms // @Memory: 38.1 MB // @comment: // @flag: /* The isBadVersion API is defined in the parent class VersionControl. boolean isBadVersion(int version); */ public class Solution extends VersionControl { public int firstBadVersion(int n) { int left=1,right=n; while(left<=right){ int mid=left+(right-left)/2; if(isBadVersion(mid)){ right=mid-1; }else{ left=mid+1; } } return left; } }
